author: Mike Vilensky
title: New York Female Legislator Will Join All-Male Group Developing Sex-Harassment Policy
text:
Gov. Andrew Cuomo on Thursday said he would add a female legislator to the all-male group hashing out the state’s new sexual-harassment policy.
The lawmaker, Senate Minority Leader Andrea Stewart-Cousins, will join in negotiations expected to take place during the next couple of months.
